item.title: 美国公司在创纪录的时间内完成 1 万亿美元的回购狂潮
item.description: 美国公司正计划以历史性的速度回购股票，这表明美国企业对经济充满信心。【原文：US companies are planning to buy back shares at a historic pace, a sign of Corporate America’s confidence in the economy.】

item.title: 反特朗普经济学议程是什么？
item.description:
如果民主党重新掌权，他们应该回归新自由主义，还是采用自己版本的经济民粹主义，抑或是两者兼而有之？【原文：

If the Democrats return to power, should they revert to neoliberalism, adopt their own version of economic populism or perhaps something in between?

item.title: OpenAI 和 Anthropic 合作开展幻觉和越狱研究
item.description: 人工智能领域最大的两家竞争对手 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 最近对彼此的模型进行了评估，以便更好地了解自己的测试可能遗漏的问题。【原文：OpenAI and Anthropic, two of the biggest rivals in artificial intelligence, recently evaluated each others’ models in an effort to better understand issues that their own tests may have missed.】

item.title: 谷歌 Pixel 10 为更换三星或苹果手机提供了最佳理由
item.description:
评测：尽管设计变化极小，但最新款 Pixel 手机凭借全面的人工智能技术脱颖而出。【原文：

Review: Despite minimal design changes, the latest Pixel phones stand out thanks to a comprehensive approach to AI.

】

item.title: 家乐福首席执行官称法国动荡带来衰退风险
item.description: 法国家乐福首席执行官亚历山大-邦帕尔（Alexandre Bompard）说，法国的政治动荡有可能使该国陷入衰退，因为它增加了一直推动经济增长的消费者的不确定性。【原文：France’s political turmoil risks pushing the country into recession because it’s increasing uncertainty among consumers who had been driving growth, Carrefour SA Chief Executive Officer Alexandre Bompard said.】

item.title: 私人信贷夫妻二人面临破产压力
item.description: 加拿大最高资本市场监管机构已提出申请，要求曾经营私人贷款公司 Bridging Finance Inc. 的夫妻档大卫-夏普（David Sharpe）和娜塔莎-夏普（Natasha Sharpe）夫妇破产，因为他们未能支付数百万美元的罚金。【原文：Canada’s top capital markets regulator has filed applications to push David and Natasha Sharpe, the husband-and-wife team who once ran private lender Bridging Finance Inc., into bankruptcy after they failed to pay millions of dollars in sanctions.】

item.title: 花旗银行称美国白银和钯金溢价定价过低
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）分析师表示，考虑到关键矿产的关税风险，美国钯银价格与国际基准价格之间的差距太小。【原文：The gap between palladium and silver prices in the US and international benchmarks is too slim, given the risk of tariffs on critical minerals, Citigroup Inc analysts said.】

item.title: 匈牙利德鲁日巴输油管道周四恢复输油
item.description: 在乌克兰袭击德鲁日巴输油管网络后，俄罗斯对匈牙利的原油运输在停止近一周后可能于周四恢复。【原文：Russian crude oil shipments to Hungary may resume on Thursday after almost a week of halt following Ukraine’s attack on Druzhba pipeline network.】

item.title: 丰业银行从达拉斯获得 270 万美元用于开设地区中心
item.description: 丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）正在加强其在美国的业务布局，达拉斯将提供高达 270 万美元的奖励措施，以赢得该银行的下一个地区办事处。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia is beefing up its US footprint and Dallas is offering as much as $2.7 million in incentives to win the lender’s next regional office.】

item.title: Anthropic 称攻击者在大范围黑客攻击中使用了人工智能工具
item.description: 该公司表示，一名黑客利用 Anthropic PBC 的技术实施了一项大规模网络犯罪计划，影响了至少 17 家组织，这是攻击者广泛利用商业人工智能工具的 "史无前例 "的实例。【原文：A hacker leveraged technology from Anthropic PBC as part of a vast cybercrime scheme that’s impacted at least 17 organizations, the company said, marking an “unprecedented” instance of attackers weaponizing a commercial artificial intelligence tool on a widespread basis.】

item.title: 美国网络支持枯竭，黑客肆虐州政府
item.description: 2013年8月20日星期二，美国明尼苏达州圣保罗市的明尼苏达州议会大厦。2012 年，明尼苏达州的实际 GDP 增长了 3.5%，在增长率排名中位居第五，仅次于北达科他州、得克萨斯州、俄勒冈州和华盛顿州。摄影师：阿丽亚娜-林奎斯特【原文：The Minnesota State Capitol stands in St. Paul, Minnesota, U.S., on Tuesday, Aug. 20, 2013. Minnesota's real GDP grew 3.5 percent in 2012 and was ranked fifth in growth after North Dakota, Texas, Oregon and Washington. Photographer: Ariana Lindquist】

item.title: 加拿大企业吸收关税成本，抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 许多加拿大公司还没有因为关税而向客户收取更高的价格，这表明与美国持续的贸易争端所带来的通胀压力可能会被推迟。【原文：Many Canadian companies aren’t yet charging their customers higher prices because of tariffs, a sign that inflation pressure stemming from the ongoing trade dispute with the US may be delayed.】

item.title: 供应强劲抵消需求，小麦创三周来最大跌幅
item.description: 芝加哥小麦期货创下三周来最大跌幅，原因是全球小麦生产前景不断改善，给市场带来压力，即使有迹象表明需求健康。【原文：Wheat futures in Chicago fell the most in three weeks as improving production prospects globally put pressure on the market, even with signs of healthy demand.】

item.title: PayPal 称服务中断导致德国出现违规行为
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. said a recent service disruption was to blame for irregularities experienced by several German banks.】

item.title: 美国天然气钻井商 EQT 正与 NextDecade 洽谈液化天然气供应事宜
item.description: 美国天然气钻探商 EQT 公司正在洽谈从 NextDecade 公司位于得克萨斯州的出口终端获得液化天然气供应的事宜。【原文：US natural gas driller EQT Corp. is in talks to take a supply of liquefied natural gas from NextDecade Corp.’s export terminal, which is being built in Texas.】

item.title: 什么是特朗普对印度征收的 "二次关税"？
item.description: 在其第二任美国总统任期内，唐纳德-特朗普将关税作为一种一揽子解决方案，以实现广泛的目标：增加国内制造业和外国市场准入、增加联邦收入，甚至惩罚起诉其政治盟友、前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗的巴西政府。现在，他又使用了一种他称之为 "二次关税 "的工具，试图让各国与美国的对手保持距离。【原文：In his second term as US president, Donald Trump has used tariffs as a blanket solution to pursue a wide range of goals: increasing domestic manufacturing and foreign market access, boosting federal revenue, and even punishing the government of Brazil for prosecuting his political ally, former President Jair Bolsonaro. Now he’s deployed a tool he calls a “secondary tariff” in an effort to get countries to distance themselves from US adversaries.】

item.title: 稳定币集团 Circle 和 Paxos 测试验证加密支付的新技术
item.description: 稳定币重量级公司Circle Internet Group Inc.和Paxos Trust Co.试行了一种新方法，以防止山寨币并帮助公司验证其持有的数字资产【原文：Stablecoin heavyweights Circle Internet Group Inc. and Paxos Trust Co. have piloted a new way to prevent copycats and help companies verify their digital asset holdings】

item.title: 一度繁荣的 AT1 市场在巴西只剩下一种债券
item.description: 巴西在全球风险最高的银行债务市场上所占的份额正在减少，因为即使外国对这种证券的需求有所上升，贷款人也会转向本地融资来满足他们的借贷需求。【原文：Brazil’s share in the global market for the riskiest type of bank debt is dwindling as lenders turn to local financing for their borrowing needs even as foreign demand for the securities picks up.】

item.title: 巴西生铁制造商与美国买家就关税风险进行谈判
item.description: 巴西的生铁生产商一直在与美国买家进行谈判，因为贸易紧张局势引发了人们对用于在美国炼钢的生铁运输的担忧。【原文：Brazil’s pig iron producers have been in talks with American buyers as trade tensions raise concerns over shipments of the commodity that’s used to make steel in the US.】

item.title: Sea 的《Free Fire》成为美国收入最高的移动射击游戏
item.description: 美国玩家在 Sea Ltd. 的《Free Fire》上花的钱比《使命召唤手机版》还多，动漫和 Netflix 的合作帮助这款游戏在今年的销量激增，成为收入最高的智能手机射击游戏。【原文：US gamers are spending more on Sea Ltd.’s Free Fire than Call of Duty Mobile, with anime and Netflix tie-ins helping the title surge in sales this year and rank as the highest-earning smartphone shooting game.】

item.title: 海耶克缓解投资者对美国关税的担忧，斯沃琪股价上涨
item.description: 斯沃琪集团（Swatch Group AG）首席执行官尼克-海耶克（Nick Hayek）安抚了投资者对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税对该制表商美国业务影响的紧张情绪，之后斯沃琪集团股价跳涨。【原文：Swatch Group AG shares jumped after Chief Executive Officer Nick Hayek soothed investor nerves over the impact of Donald Trump’s tariffs on the watchmaker’s US business.】

item.title: 交易员等待 Nvidia 财报结果，美国股市出现波动
item.description: 周三，在收盘后英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）发布季度财报之前，美国股市在涨跌之间徘徊。【原文：US stocks shuffled between gains and losses on Wednesday ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s quarterly earnings, due after the closing bell, which will offer crucial insights into the artificial-intelligence trade.】

item.title: 丹格特燃料计划因中国卡车运输瓶颈而推迟
item.description: 由于中国供应商在物流方面的挫折，阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）开始用卡车从其巨型炼油厂向尼日利亚各地运送燃料的计划被推迟。【原文：Aliko Dangote’s plan to begin trucking fuel across Nigeria from his giant refinery has been delayed after logistics setbacks from Chinese suppliers.】

item.title: 激进派 Elliott 据称将持有 Rexford REIT 大量股份
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，艾略特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已在总部位于洛杉矶的房地产投资信托公司 Rexford Industrial Realty Inc.【原文：Elliott Investment Management has built an active stake in Los Angeles-based real estate investment trust Rexford Industrial Realty Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台湾在台积电芯片制造技术盗窃案中起诉三人
item.description: 检察官指控三人涉嫌窃取台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Prosecutors have charged three people for allegedly stealing trade secrets from Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., advancing an investigation that’s cast a spotlight on the sensitive nature of chipmaking technology.】

item.title: 奥伦重组预示波兰股市将面临更多不确定性
item.description: 随着新任国有资产部长的上任，本月波兰政府经营的公司领导层发生了意想不到的调整，这预示着可能会出现更多的变化。【原文：The unexpected leadership shake-ups at Poland’s government-run companies this month signal more changes are likely to come as the new state assets minister has taken the reins.】

item.title: 激进主义者 Plantro 推动 Calian 在防务尾声时出售产品
item.description: 激进投资者 Plantro Ltd. 正敦促 Calian Group Ltd. 考虑出售其全部或部分业务，认为这家加拿大技术和服务公司的重组时机已经成熟，有助于提振其被低估的股价。【原文：Activist investor Plantro Ltd. is urging Calian Group Ltd. to consider a sale of all or part of its business, arguing that the Canadian tech and services company is ripe for a shake-up to help boost its undervalued shares.】

item.title: 公司加强经济数据产品，对美国统计数据的信任度下降
item.description: 私营公司正抓住联邦数据不确定的时机，加强对美国政府统计数据的替代。【原文：Private-sector companies are beefing up their alternatives to US government statistics, seizing a moment of uncertainty around federal data.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯称每次政策会议都是利率的 "现场直播
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，美国中央银行下个月的政策会议将是一次 "现场 "会议，他暗示了采取利率举措的可能性，但没有说明他将支持采取何种行动。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said the US central bank’s policy meeting next month would be a “live” one, hinting at the possibility of an interest-rate move without saying what course of action he would support.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔就贿赂定罪向斯洛伐克最高法院提出上诉
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）今年 5 月被判犯有受贿罪，他提出了上诉，斯洛伐克最高法院将对上诉进行审理。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir, who was convicted of bribery in May, filed an appeal that will be examined by Slovakia’s Supreme Court.】
